name: UI Components
description: Constitutional rules for frontend UI component development (customized for saas-starter)
rules: CRITICAL: Implement responsive design for mobile, tablet, and desktop
CRITICAL: Add accessibility features (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, screen reader support)
HIGH: Follow project design system and style guide consistently
HIGH: Use semantic HTML elements (header, nav, main, footer, article)
HIGH: Implement error states and loading states for all components
HIGH: Extract reusable components instead of duplicating code
MEDIUM: Optimize images and assets for performance
MEDIUM: Add proper alt text for all images
MEDIUM: Test components across different browsers
MEDIUM: Use CSS preprocessors or utility frameworks (Tailwind, SCSS) consistently
CRITICAL: Use JWT with refresh token rotation (30-day expiry)
CRITICAL: Never store passwords in plaintext (use bcrypt with salt rounds 12)
CRITICAL: Implement MFA for admin accounts
CRITICAL: Use HTTPS everywhere (enforce in production)
CRITICAL: Validate all incoming WebSocket messages against schemas
CRITICAL: Use WebSocket connection authentication (never trust client)
CRITICAL: Use semantic HTML for accessibility (WCAG 2.1 Level AA)
CRITICAL: Implement responsive design for mobile-first approach
CRITICAL: Handle loading and error states in all async operations
HIGH: Use shadcn/ui components with Tailwind CSS
HIGH: Implement proper form validation with error messages
HIGH: Add loading indicators for long-running operations
HIGH: Prevent double-submit with button state management
MEDIUM: Use Tailwind CSS utility classes (no inline styles)
MEDIUM: Maintain consistent spacing and typography
MEDIUM: Implement dark mode support
antiPatterns: Hardcoded colors and spacing (use design tokens)
Non-responsive designs that break on mobile
Mixing styling approaches (inline styles + CSS + utility classes)

guidelines.componentStructure: Keep components small and focused on single responsibility
guidelines.styling: Follow project conventions (CSS Modules, Styled Components, Tailwind)
guidelines.accessibility: Test with screen readers and keyboard-only navigation
